projects.title: Simpology Australia
projects.description: Contributing to one of Australia's leading end-to-end loan origination platforms.Engaged in user requirement analysis and planning tasks and technical specifications. Contributed to sub-status alert tracking for loan applications to improve monitoring and notifications. Developed features for digital income verifications, ensuring up-to-date and accurate data.

projects.title: Praisal
projects.description: Initiated and executed the research, design, and development of Calcey Resource Management Portal version 1.0, facilitating the seamless allocation of human resources for the organization's resource management team based on project needs. Presently focused on transitioning this tool into a market-ready product, allowing customization for use by other companies.

projects.title: Nelly.com
projects.description: Nelly is one of the Nordic’s leading e-commerce platforms in fashion and accessories for Women. It owns and operates Nellyman.com for men as well. Nelly’s platform included mobile apps, a back office and internal software. It supported multiple countries and languages.

projects.title: AiScout
projects.description: aiScout is a comprehensive platform designed to help various sporting organizations, including professional football clubs, national squads, universities, private academies, and schools, engage, analyze, trial, rate, score, and develop amateur and signed players using just a mobile phone. The platform comprises a player app, scout app, and control centre, creating a fully connected ecosystem throughout the sporting organisation.

projects.title: Stanford GSB eLearning platform
projects.description: Worked as Full-Stack Developer on version upgrades of the Stanford Graduate School of Business eLearning platform which is used by 50 other business schools, nearly 800 global universities, Fortune 500 companies, government agencies, and the US military.

projects.title: Enactor
projects.description: Enactor is a leading provider of next-generation retail store systems, offering advanced omnichannel Point of Sale (POS) solutions and innovative store solutions. With a strong global presence spanning 35 countries across Europe, APAC, North America, Latin America and Asia, Enactor powers over 800 million transactions annually, generating £20+ billion in revenue and supporting 50,000+ POS devices across the world.

projects.title: SIBOS COLLATERAL
projects.description: SIBOS COLLATERAL is a key investment project by Virtusa, focusing on Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and Machine Learning (ML). In the first phase, the team automated the Name Screening process to identify blacklisted entities, such as individuals or locations, in transaction documents to detect and prevent fraud.

projects.title: DTS Insights
projects.description: DTS Insights is a microservices-based Enterprise Software Development Life cycle dashboarding and gamification platform. It sits on top of enterprise tools like Sonarqube, JIRA, and Git to make quality and produce actionable and engaging Developers, Testers, and Business analysts of the organization.
